state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to go to the south. Next, try to head west. And then, try to head north. Then, attempt to travel west. And then, make an effort to take a trip north. And then, make an attempt to venture north. And then, venture east. And then, make an effort to head south. Then, attempt to venture east. After that, go south. That done, venture east. With that done, venture south. Then, try to head south. After that, try to venture south. Then, retrieve the coin from the floor of the basement. Alright, thanks! -= Dish-Pit =- You've just walked into a dish-pit. You don't like doors?
